introduction/intro.title: Introduction
introduction/intro.description: Wage Protection System (WPS) is all about salary processing to employees of Domestic or Company Employees. Domestic employees are such as house help etc, and Company employees are those who work in some registered company/corporate.

salary-information-file/create-a-sif.title: Create a SIF
salary-information-file/create-a-sif.description: Salary Information File (SIF) is a file, typically an excel file in which we have to insert the information of all the employees and their details who will be receiving salary for certain month.
